tool_description: Generates correlation matrices between assets using various correlation measures and time windows.

rolling_window.description: Rolling window size for dynamic correlations

error_messages: Insufficient assets: Need at least 2 assets for correlation calculation.
Invalid correlation method: Use one of [pearson, spearman, kendall].
Invalid rolling window: Must be at least 30 and not exceed available data length.
Missing return data: Return data not available for correlation calculation.
usage: Provide asset symbols with return data and specify correlation methodology. Returns correlation matrix and related statistics.

matrix_size.description: Dimensions of the correlation matrix (n x n)

average_correlation.description: Average pairwise correlation across all assets
